name: A Probable Null
description:
Summary:

You're being tested over and over, not in a creepy way, just for playtesting. Though something feels off, some things you thinks exist are null or in a simpler term, fake. You remember them, but they suddenly change position or deleted. They look double to you, or you go through them. You'll have a hard time differentiate them. Though you remember a yellow thing above one of the rooms.

This game submitted for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme It is Not Real.

Controls:

Move Left : Left Arrow or A

Move Right : Right Arrow or D

Jump : Spacebar, Up Arrow, or W

Beam : Right Click

Shield : Left Click

Note, if you can't refocus, click the display and scroll up the mouse.

Credits:

All assets were made by me.

The tools I've used:

Game Engine - Godot Engine

Art Tool - GIMP

Sound Effect - sfxr by DrPetter

Music - OnlineSequencer
